Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After leading Virginia Commonwealth to the Final Four, Shaka Smart agreed to a new eight-year contract as coach, the team spokesman said Monday.
snippet: After leading Virginia Commonwealth to the Final Four, Shaka Smart agreed to a new eight-year contract as coach, the team spokesman said Monday.
